name: .TREC
summary: Learn about .TREC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TREC files with the Windows and macOS versions of TechSmith Camtasia. To open a TREC file, select File → Import → Media..., drag the file onto Camtasia, or double-click the file (only works if it is associated with Camtasia).
Camtasia can convert a TREC file to several file types, including the following formats:

images.caption: TREC file open in TechSmith Camtasia 2023
